meta.summary:
b"I will never sacrifice my honor: http://blizz.ly/MeetGenji 

The former son of the master of the Shimada ninja clan, Genji was almost slain in a disagreement with his brother Hanzo over their familys illegal businesses. On the brink of death, Overwatch saved his life by putting him through an extensive process of cyberization in exchange for his help in their operations against his familys empire. Once repulsed by the mechanical parts of his body, Genji has made peace with himself, and in doing so has discovered a higher humanity.

Genji's new form enhanced his natural speed and agility and enhanced his superlative ninja skills. His main weapons are his arsenal of precise and deadly Shuriken, and his katana, which he uses to deflect incoming attacks. He utilizes his augmented abilities to climb walls, double jump, and deliver dashing Swift Strikes that leaves his foes bleeding. When the time comes for Genji to unleash his blade, he summons the dragon and can cut down enemies with a single slash.

Pre-Purchase Now: http://blizz.ly/BuyOverwatch 
Sign-up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch"

item.title: Overwatch Guide | How to Get Better at Genji (Genji Tips and Tricks/Gameplay)

meta.summary:
b"Today in Overwatch I want to go over how to get better at playing Genji, arguably the most difficult hero to play. Obviously you vets out there would probably know all of this, but it's a good starting place for the people who are struggling to get Genji's play style.

This isn't going to be the typical guide where I go super in depth, but rather I wanted to focus more on the playstyle and nuances required to getting better with Genji

FULL GUIDE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tuG-Od_zoXg

Thank you for tsaoshin for providing the thumbnail artwork
https://www.paigeeworld.com/u/tsaoshin

*Channel Banner and Logo made by Tomographic (HIT HIM UP IF YOU WANT AWESOME ARTWORK DONE!)
https://twitter.com/ItsTomographic
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOt5hVyS2-nbcJ3_FP41Ajg"

b"It appears that many think Genji's strength fell alongside Tracer's in the Brigitte era however, Genji is much more powerful than you think, top tier in fact and it's because he's more effective at mobility positioning outplay and can afford to maintain as a threat on a flank, follow up on openings and close out fights with blade which charges relatively fast. In this video we discuss the most notable and expected exception, tanky Brigitte comps, who many assume would stun Genji into oblivion, but its with disciplined tank play and precise mid range poke harass that Genji excels. We don't cover what we assume to be obvious to everyone by now, Snipers or mid range immobile (farmable) heroes like Soldier or Widow are weak to Genji as well and obviously he's even in a dive mirror. Really, there's nothing you can run to outright stop solid Genji play right now because he has the tools to outplay everything, even his counters. If you enjoyed the video be sure to leave a like! 

OUR VARIETY STREAM! https://www.fb.gg/yogaming

Subscribe here - http://bit.ly/2aN1OuO

item.title: Overwatch: The BEST Genji in the WORLD! - Shadowburn Pro Analysis

meta.summary:
b"Overwatch League has some insane Genji players, but the one that time and time again carries his team to victory is Shadowburn who has made a name for himself with very disciplined play, intelligent movement and stellar playmaking star power that keeps the Philadelphia Fusion competitive in any match they play. Today we cover a few aspects of what makes his Genji play the best in the world in our opinion, particularly how he manipulates the ult economy to ensure his dragonblades don't get countered by support ults as well as his quick evaluation of fights and ability to find the key part of the engagement to exploit his targets. If you enjoyed the video be sure to leave it a like!
